channel.title: Question about making admin only commands + other stuff
channel.description:
So..I was wondering, exactly how you make certain commands Admin only? and how you make it when someone dies, they come back with full hitpoints, instead of 0? and how do you make a Mod only area? Lastly can anyone send me codes for that, and for making a few dungeons? please help...thanks
o and btw.. i am using HybridScape

thanks

item.title: Question about making admin only commands + other stuff
item.dc:creator: @newyorkowns newyorkowns
item.description:
@newyorkowns wrote:

uhh idk alot about hybridscape but here i go

question #1

in the command

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 3)

where it says player rights change it to 2 thats for admin and 1 for mod

question #2

uhh idk?

question #3

make a tele command and make it player rights 1

question #4

look in tut section

hope that helped =] if this helped you and u can rep i accept rep (anytime lol)XD

Read full topic
